title: Reducing to a system of two equations
text: The first step is to pick two equations and solve for one variable.

title: Solving for one variable
text: What is the resulting equation that comes from multiplying equation (1) by $$5$$, multiplying equation (2) by $$2$$, and adding the two equations together?

title: Solving the system of two equations
text: The next step is to use the resulting equation and equation $$3$$ to solve the system of two equations.

title: Finding the value of the last variable
text: The last step is to back-substitute the known variables into any one of the original equations and solve for the missing variable.
